name: Web Swing Hero
description:
Ready to swing a web in the game? Super hero spider power is a dream come true! Now you can be a Web Swing Hero. Shoot the web and attack every threat to your neighborhood.

In this superhero game you will use sticky spider ropes to fly and move.You will play as a Web Hero with spider abilities who will use his web to hook every barrier in the air. Use your rope to swing back and forth for ragdoll fun, just throw your web and fly. Don`t forget to shoot spider-webs and fight enemies on your way.


Tap to stick and grab onto an obstacle with sticky web ropes.
Use your rope to move.
Use your flying spider skills.
Make everything swing!
Shoot your spider web.
Fight enemies.

Get ready for some action! Now you are a web hero having super spider abilities. Swing with your web throughout the city adventure. Use Spiderman's ragdoll physics to your advantage. Go through various challenges in this swinging game. Use your spider web, battle against your enemies. Be aware of the enemies shooting at you.

Incredible superpowers.
Smooth engaging gameplay.
3D rope swinging game.
Easy, one-finger swipe control.
Ragdoll animations.
Easily move with your rope web and remove everyone trying to hurt you.

Swing as much as you can in this superhero game. Now you are a super Web Hero!
